Module se1.bestellsystem
Package system

Interface Calculator

public interface Calculator
Public interface of calculator that contains method to calculate total prices and VAT on Orders

    • calculateValue

      long calculateValue​(Iterable<Order> orders)
      Method that returns the value of an Order Iterable
      Parameters:
      orders - iterable with orders to be processed
      Returns:
      long value corresponding to the sum of the orders content value

      Returns:

      Returns:
      long value corresponding to the sum of the VAT

      Method that calculated the Vat for a single given Order

      Returns:
      long value corresponding to the VAT of the Order

    • calculateIncludedVAT

      long calculateIncludedVAT​(long price, TAX taxRate)
      Method that calculates the VAT given price and VAT rate
      Parameters:
      price - long value corresponding to the price of an Item
      taxRate - TAX Object in which the VAT rate of the item is stored
      Returns:
      long value corresponding to the VAT given total price and taxRate
